question: This bank has bagged the 'best bank' award among small banks for the use of technology for financial inclusion.
explanation: Karnataka Bank has bagged the 'best bank' award among small banks for the use of technology for financial inclusion announced on 3rd Sept 21017. Mahabaleshwara MS, MD & CEO of the bank had received the award from Sudarshan Sen, Executive Director of RBI, in Hyderabad and said this recognition will further motivate the bank in implementing its IT strategies more effectively in promoting financial inclusion.
